00001 // Sound.cpp: implementation of the CSound class.
00002 //
00004 
00005 #include <memory.h>
00006 #include <malloc.h>
00007 
00008 #include "Sound.h"
00009 #include "EasySound.h"
00010 
00012 // Construction/Destruction
00014 CSound::CSound(char *filename, int iSoundID)
00015 {       
00016         m_iSoundID = iSoundID;
00017         Uint32 len;
00018         if (SDL_LoadWAV(filename, &m_spec, &m_data, &len) == NULL ) {
00019                 fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't load %s: %s\n",filename, SDL_GetError());
00020                 m_len = CSoundTime(0);
00021                 return;
00022         }
00023         m_len = CSoundTime(len);
00024         m_pos = CSoundTime(0);
00025 
00026         CEasySound *es = CEasySound::Instance();
00027         SDL_AudioSpec obtained = es->GetObtained();
00028         SDL_AudioCVT cvt;
00029 
00030         SDL_BuildAudioCVT(&cvt, m_spec.format, m_spec.channels, m_spec.freq, obtained.format, obtained.channels, obtained.freq);
00031         cvt.buf = (Uint8*)malloc(m_len.GetSDLTime() * cvt.len_mult);
00032         memcpy(cvt.buf, m_data, m_len.GetSDLTime());
00033         cvt.len = m_len.GetSDLTime();
00034         SDL_ConvertAudio(&cvt);
00035         SDL_FreeWAV(m_data);
00036         
00037         SDL_LockAudio();
00038         m_data = cvt.buf;
00039         // the new length of sound after convert from 8bit to 16bit
00040         m_len = CSoundTime( cvt.len_cvt );
00041         m_pos = CSoundTime( 0 );
00042         SDL_UnlockAudio();
00043         
00044 }
00045 
00046 CSound::~CSound()
00047 {
00048         SDL_FreeWAV(m_data);
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 bool CSound::Play(CSoundTime start, CSoundTime length)
00053 {
00054         m_pos = start;
00055         m_stop = length;
00056         SDL_PauseAudio(0);
00057         return 0;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool CSound::Play()
00061 {
00062         m_pos = CSoundTime(0);
00063         m_stop = m_len;
00064         SDL_PauseAudio(0); 
00065         
00066     return 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 CSoundTime CSound::Stop()
00070 {
00071         SDL_PauseAudio(1);
00072         return CSoundTime(0,0,0);
00073 }
00074 
00075 CSoundTime CSound::GetLength()
00076 {
00077         return CSoundTime(m_len);
00078 }
